creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: standing figure turned 3/4 to PL, wearing a mask with animal face with pointed mouth and large eyes, with feathers on back and green feathers or leaves around bottom; figure holds a bow and a rattle and wears a sash (?) on PR hip with geometric patterns and predominately green short boot-type moccasins
title: Hopi Kachina
